short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with a daily dose of inspiration through uplifting quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay motivated and inspired with every new tab you open! This Chrome extension displays a new and uplifting motivational quote every time you click on the extension icon. Whenever you need a boost of positivity, simply click on the extension and be greeted with a new quote to keep you motivated throughout the day. With a sleek and beautiful design, the extension is easy to use and adds a touch of inspiration to your browsing experience.

But that's not all! You can also copy the quote to your clipboard, view another quote, or even share the quote on Twitter with just a few clicks. With these added features, you can easily spread motivation and positivity to your friends and followers. Remember, as the saying goes, "Motivation is like food for the brain. You cannot get enough in one sitting. It needs continual and regular top-ups." - Peter Davies.

Start your day off right with this powerful tool!
